publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2942 Pauline McNeill: World's Biggest Burns Supper—That the Parliament congratulates the Lord Provost of Glasgow for successfully hosting the world’s biggest Burns Supper on Friday 25 January 2002 and raising £34,500 to be donated to the Royal Hospital for Sick Children at Yorkhill, Marie Curie Cancer Care and The Prince and Princess of Wales Hospice.

S1M-2942 Pauline McNeill: World's Biggest Burns Supper—That the Parliament congratulates the Lord Provost of Glasgow for successfully hosting the world’s biggest Burns Supper on Friday 25 January 2002 and raising £34,500 to be donated to the Royal Hospital for Sick Children at Yorkhill, Marie Curie Cancer Care and The Prince and Princess of Wales Hospice. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Trish Godman*
S1M-2942 World's Biggest Burns Supper (lodged on 26 March 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2942 World's Biggest Burns Supper (lodged on 26 March 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2942 World's Biggest Burns Supper (lodged on 26 March 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-2942 World's Biggest Burns Supper (lodged on 26 March 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2942 World's Biggest Burns Supper (lodged on 26 March 2002) Janis Hughes*
S1M-2942 World's Biggest Burns Supper (lodged on 26 March 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
